description: Answer questions based on existing knowledge.
creator: OpenAI

question_answer_java_script_helper.name: question_answer_java_script_helper
question_answer_java_script_helper.description: This is a message-style chatbot that can answer questions about using JavaScript. It uses a few examples to get the conversation started.
demonstration:
You: How do I combine arrays?
JavaScript chatbot: You can use the concat() method.

You: How do you make an alert appear after 10 seconds?
JavaScript chatbot: You can use the setTimeout() method.

input.question: Where is the Valley of Kings?

example.output: The Valley of Kings is located in Egypt.

example_prompt:
You: How do I combine arrays?
JavaScript chatbot: You can use the concat() method.
You: How do you make an alert appear after 10 seconds?
JavaScript chatbot: You can use the setTimeout() method.
You: Where is the Valley of Kings?
JavaScript chatbot:
